constituent: call, mouth, even, water-lily, lily pad, question mark
heisigStory: Mouth . . . water lily. Note: this is the one time that the "stem" has a barb at the end. Work this fact into your story.
koohiiStory1: 'Budd' - 'weis' - 'er' call the frogs mouths from the liliy pads, working to get you hooked on beer.
koohiiStory2: I´m a lazy fisher, so I genetically engineered a lily pad with a fishing hook at the stem and a mouth to call me whenever it catches something.
words: to challenge, to call somebody to halt
breath, respiration, knack, trick, secret (of doing something)
call out to, accost, address (crowd), make an appeal
